firstCard.title: What is your goal?

firstCard.thirdItem: Videos for social networks for the purpose of promoting a product or service, or a company

firstCard.fifthItem: Viral video for the purpose of popularization

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.subTitle: Choose a service of interest and we will estimate the cost of the product
calculator.disclaimerTitle: is the estimated cost of your project.
calculator.disclaimer: This is an estimated price according to the parameters you specified. In reality, the price can be higher or lower, depending on your needs. For an individual calculation, leave your contact details and our manager will contact you.

importantOptions.actors: Selection of actors (license for an actor)
importantOptions.advFormat: Advanced format with strategy, actors and complex production
importantOptions.simpleFormat: A simple format of talking videos with several characters on the street or in the office

caseStudies.title: Case studies
caseStudies.description: We chose the yummiest works from our portfolio. Would you like to see more?

firstCard.title: 2D explainer
firstCard.need: Create an explainer to break down the product into simple language and deliver value of the products, assessment to the customer.
firstCard.result: As a result, more credibility is established and the customer has fewer objections. After the creation of these products, managers communicated information using this video, and the customer perceived the value of the offer more easily.

secondCard.title: 3D animation
secondCard.need: The owner wanted to visually present the object to accelerate decision-making and sales even before the end of construction works.
secondCard.result: Sales increased by 40%. The video presentation stirred the interest of 80% of new potential buyers, 50% of whom made a decision to buy a home.

thirdCard.title: 3D-motion presentation
thirdCard.need: To make a presentation video – a countdown of an architectural project of a hospital for investors in order to retain the attention and preserve the trust and investment of the company.
thirdCard.result: 100% positive feedback from customers and investors at a private screening.
